tidbits.title: Historical Heritage
tidbits.description: Ukraine boasts a rich historical heritage, seen in its UNESCO World Heritage Sites like Kyiv's Saint Sophia Cathedral and the ancient city of Lviv.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country embraces diverse cultures, traditions, and languages, with influences from Eastern and Western Europe contributing to its vibrant cultural tapestry.

tidbits.title: Agricultural Breadbasket
tidbits.description: Ukraine is known as the 'breadbasket of Europe' due to its fertile soils, producing significant amounts of grains and being a major agricultural exporter.
